p: Current commercially available NS1 immunological test products are rapid and do not require trained personnel to operate. They have been shown to have great performance for detecting DENV in both human and mosquitoes [ 44]. However, they do not provide serotype information. In addition, its sensitivity was relatively low on days 1 and 2 and after day 5 post-symptomatic onset in human, compared to that seen with the-RT-PCR methods [ 16].
